article.title: Pilkington to Build Special Operations Simulator Facility
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Pilkington Commercial Company, Yuma, Arizona, was awarded a $10,030,000 firm-fixed-price contract to design and construct a special operations forces free fall simulator facility in Yuma. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, LosÂ Angeles, California, is the contracting activity.
